name: SnailPipe
description:
A Short and Sweet Metroidvania about a Robot trying to get off an unknown planet...

Try to survive a unknown planet that tries to throw everything its got at you. Explore and find funny and quirky NPC's, unlock abilities and find new power-ups. 

  • Explore 6 different biomes and areas
  • NPC Interactions
  • More than 2 hours of possible playtime
  • Metroidvania upgrades
  • 2 Boss fights
  • 11+ Enemies to fight

Controls:

  • Move left and right: = A/D
  • Jump: = SPACE
  • Pew Pew: = Left Mouse Button
  • Interaction With Characters and Objects: = E

Credits:

  • Andrea Baroni - Music  and a few SFX
